attributes.action: Single mums need more support UC deducts 63p for every £1 earn off your benefits
attributes.additional_details: Gov website shows the entitlement for single parents.
attributes.background: All I wanted to do was be able to spend time with my child while going back to work part time before he goes to preschool and then start to up my hours at work. But due to universal credits it’s unliveable to stay at home or even go to work part time. I need to support myself & him on very little

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you're concerned about universal credit, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256542
